alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 2:59PM EST until February 04 at 11:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Aughwick Creek At Shirleysburg affecting Huntingdon County. Swatara Creek At Harper Tavern affecting Schuylkill and Lebanon Counties. For the Aughwick Creek...including Shirleysburg...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Swatara Creek...including Middletown, Harper Tavern, Hershey...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aughwick Creek At Shirleysburg. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Aughwick Creek at Shirleysburg exceeds its banks. Several homes are affected. At 12.0 feet, Flood waters from Aughwick Creek cover portions of Gilbo Road, Aughwick Mills Road and Keystone Road in Shirley Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:30 PM EST Friday was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 4.9 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM EST.
